questions.subject: math
questions.content_zh: {"stem": "一架 10 英尺长的梯子靠在墙上，底部离墙 6 英尺。梯子能到达多高？", "answer": "C", "options": ["A. 4 ft", "B. 6 ft", "C. 8 ft", "D. 10 ft"]}

questions.content_zh: {"stem": "用求根公式解方程 x² + 2x - 8 = 0，解是什么？", "answer": "A", "options": ["A. x = 2, x = -4", "B. x = -2, x = 4", "C. x = 1, x = -8", "D. x = 4, x = -2"]}
